meanings.definition: The process by which the immune system attacks the body's own cells and tissues.
meanings.sent1: Autoimmunization can lead to the immune system mistakenly attacking healthy cells.
meanings.sent2: Doctors are studying autoimmunization to understand why the body attacks itself.
meanings.sent3: When autoimmunization goes haywire, it's like the immune system is confused and attacks its own team.
meanings.sent4: The concept of autoimmunization is like a friendly fire situation within the body.
meanings.sent5: Autoimmunization is like a security system malfunctioning and targeting the wrong intruders.

meanings.definition: The development of an immune response against the body's own antigens.
meanings.sent1: Autoimmunization can occur when the immune system mistakenly targets the body's own antigens.
meanings.sent2: Understanding autoimmunization is crucial in treating autoimmune diseases.
meanings.sent3: In a strange twist, autoimmunization can make the immune system turn against itself.
meanings.sent4: The idea of autoimmunization is like the immune system becoming its own worst enemy.
meanings.sent5: Autoimmunization is like a rebellion within the immune system, causing chaos and confusion.
